channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @jeffjarvis That's the key point. At least a few users have to be committed to seeing it through. The rewards are there. I imagine a good place to find users are at universities, the students. Once the system is working, they can get jobs using it. It feeds back into itself.
@jeffjarvis Thanks Jeff.
U.S. experts bracing for another coronavirus surge. https://t.co/0NQvopH4OF
Opposition to new Clinton Hill sex shop reaches climax. https://t.co/Mxr0Yjn2Uz
Putin in his last speech pretty much admitted that his next war is going to be a civil war, and I bet it never gets that far.
@KevinCTofel Hmmm. It’s not like I never gave you a clue. 🤠
I cheated on this one. #Worldle #55 3/6 (100%) 🟩🟩🟨⬜⬜↖️ 🟩🟩🟩🟩⬜⬆️ 🟩🟩🟩🟩🟩🎉 https://t.co/bnHTZz2fpg
When the Lakers lose an angel gets their wings. https://t.co/W0gCJZfrWN
How Russians see Russia. https://t.co/EfBMtL3WdW
@JoeTrippi Meanwhile they tell their viewers not to get vaccinated.
It’s time to prosecute Donald Trump. https://t.co/qxUepAxjAW
“Listen where ever you get your podcasts” == the sound of victory in the battle to keep the podcastoshere from being dominated by evil tech companies.
The surprising link between Covid-19 deaths and lack of internet access. https://t.co/lnQ1BSrYBs
I love to eat.
You must listen to the latest episode of Radio Open Source on nuclear warfare past and present. https://t.co/VOsV4kTa7k
Thanks to @jeffjarvis for the recommendation of Elie Mystal's audiobook. Just listened to the first hour. It's irreverent, direct, eye-opening and important. https://t.co/XOsSdtmY2p
@mistersugar That isn’t necessary. If you have the time listen to todays podcast.

BTW the first feed was mine. Here’s the announcement. https://t.co/cK8fMop2hk This is why we needed blogging before anything else. It was the way new tech innovation could be announced when journalism was ignoring it.

I can’t imagine Lebron has any fans left after he’s left so many teams. It’s not just that he wins championships, it’s that he leaves behind wrecks. Fans don’t want to win as much as we want to love. I’m glad he never chose the Knicks. https://t.co/1tS1mYrNpf
I can’t imagine another team accepting LeBron unless he swears he will leave the team in better condition than he found it. That would be something worth giving a try. go to Orlando, for example, and don’t bring any stars with you, just work. And do it for a dollar a year.

BTW the first feed was mine. Here’s the announcement. This is why we needed blogging before anything else. It was the way new tech innovation could be announced when journalism was ignoring it. https://t.co/Nt4PVoXerR https://t.co/cK8fMop2hk
Deaths of Russian Generals Expose Vulnerabilities. https://t.co/wKq0YqIdNe

This is encouraging. Not the final deal, but not a terrible one either. @sarahkendzior -- who I usually agree with, does not like it. I don't Russia is any old autocracy, they have the nukes. Think past this step where the nukes go away if that's possible. How to get there? https://t.co/BGMnVXROHc
Sarah -- highly recommend listening to the current episode of Radio Open Source about nuclear war.
https://t.co/VOsV4kTa7k
@sabre23t that was not necessary.
